info.name: Tokyo Night Twitter
info.description: Twitter with vscode theme of Tokyo Night

@-moz-document domain("twitter.com") {
  :root {
    --dark0: #16161e;
    --dark25: #17171f;
    --dark50: #181820;
    --dark75: #181818;
    --dark100: #1a1b26;
    --dark150: #1b1c28;
    --dark200: #1d1e2b;
    --dark250: #1d1d27;
    --hover: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.133);
    --shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.267);
    --border-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.067);
    --border-medium: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.133);
    --text-primary: #c0caf5;
    --text-secondary: #a9b1d6;
    --text-highlighted: #9aa5ce;
    --border-radius: 4px;
    --custom-color: #7aa2f5;
    --custom-color-translucent: 20;
  }

  /* ->scroll-bar<- */

  ::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 1rem;
  }
  
  /* Track */
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: #1e1e30;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
  }
  
  /* Handle */
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: #2d2d47;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
  }
  
  /* Handle on hover */
  ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: #565f89;
  }

  /* ->scroll-bar<- */

  }

  .twtr-color-bg--white-neutral,
  .twtr-color-bg--blue-dark {
    background: transparent;
  }

  .u01__dropdown-item {
    border-color: var(--border-light);
  }

  .se01__result {
    border-color: var(--border-medium);
  }

  .twtr-color-border--blue-dark {
    border-color: var(--custom-color);
  }

  .twtr-color--blue-dark,
  .se01__page-number {
    color: var(--custom-color) !important;
  }

  .twtr-color--blue-dark.has-hover:active,
  .twtr-color--blue-dark.has-hover:hover {
    filter: brightness(85%);
  }

  .u01__navbar-item {
    height: 100%;
  }

  li svg {
    fill: currentcolor;
  }

  .r-1vtznih,
  .r-l5o3uw {
    transition: filter 250ms ease-in-out;
  }

  .r-aes8xq {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top, transparent, var(--dark100));
  }
}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://twitter.com/i/cards/"), url-prefix("https://twitter.com/settings/facebook/frame")
{
